thread.title: World Spa Awards signs Sun Group ahead of Gala Ceremony 2015
thread.title_full: World Spa Awards signs Sun Group ahead of Gala Ceremony 2015

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: World Spa Awards signs Sun Group ahead of Gala Ceremony 2015
text:
World Spa Awards signs Sun Group ahead of Gala Ceremony 2015 World Spa Awards signs Sun Group ahead of Gala Ceremony 2015 Details   11:15 World Spa Awards has signed Sun Group as its latest Event Partner for the Gala Ceremony 2015. The inaugural World Spa Awards Gala Ceremony will take place at the InterContinental® Danang Sun Peninsula Resort, Vietnam, on Monday, September 14th, with industry leaders from around the world expected to be in attendance. 
Sungroup, the investor behind Ba Na Hills, Asia Park and Premier Village, aspires to create timeless developments and has left deep impressions on Danang and many other famous tourist destinations in Vietnam. World Spa Awards Managing Director Gina Reynolds said: “It is a pleasure for us to welcome Sun Group as an Event Partner ahead of our upcoming Gala Ceremony in Vietnam. “Considered one of the most successful tourism organisations in Vietnam, and indeed Asia, our relationship with Sun Group is sure to be a great asset as we complete our final preparations.” Owning a portfolio of architectural masterpieces, world record breaking developments and mammoth recreational parks, Sun Group is proud to be one of Vietnam’s premier hotel and tourism developers, helping to change the country’s tourism scene. The group has built firm foundations for its brand to become well-known in the region and the world. Following successes it has achieved, Sun Group is developing a number of international-standard projects in such tourist destinations as Sapa, Quang Ninh and Phu Quoc, which are considered the future of Vietnam’s tourism.
